Trade/Device Name(s): Dexcom G6 Glucose Program Continuous Glucose Monitoring System
Dexcom G6 Continuous Glucose Monitoring System
Dexcom Pro Q Continuous Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dexcom G6, G6 Glucose Program, and Pro Q continuous glucose monitoring systems with alternative adhesive patch for management and retrospective analysis of glycemic control.
Indications for Use Summary: Real time or retrospective continuous glucose monitoring for management of diabetes or glycemic variability in persons aged 2 years and older, replacing fingerstick blood glucose testing, with connectivity to digitally connected devices including automated insulin dosing systems.
